member.name: CRYPT_CREDENTIALS
member.summary: The CRYPT_CREDENTIALS structure contains information about credentials that can be passed as optional input to a remote object retrieval function such as or .

member.name: CRYPT_CREDENTIALS.cbSize
member.summary: The size in bytes of this structure.

summary.para: A pointer to a null-terminated string that contains the type of credential object represented by the pvCredentials member.
This member can contain the following possible value.

listheader.description: The pvCredentials member contains a structure that represents a user name and password combination.

member.name: CRYPT_CREDENTIALS.pvCredentials
member.summary: A pointer to a structure as defined by the pszCredentialsOid member.
